natlang.rdg.model
Class RSGraph

java.lang.Object
  parlevink.parlegraph.model.MComponentAdapter
      parlevink.parlegraph.model.MVertexAdapter
          parlevink.parlegraph.model.MGraphAdapter
              natlang.rdg.model.RSGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
parlevink.parlegraph.model.MComponent, parlevink.parlegraph.model.MGraph, parlevink.parlegraph.model.MVertex, parlevink.xml.XMLizable
public class RSGraph
extends parlevink.parlegraph.model.MGraphAdapter

RSGraph is a MGraph which models a rhetorical dependency structure, constructing it out of a xml-document.
